title: PS5 Launches! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.12.20
description:
Greg and Tim talk about Sony shipping the wrong PS5, Call of Duty using the DualSense, and more!

00:00:00 - Start
00:03:50 - Housekeeping
Today - Bugsnax Launch Party @ 11:30 AND TwitchGaming @ 1
This Friday Andy is going to stream Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War campaign with his fancy PC to show off Ray Tracing to show off his Nvidia RTX 3080 (Sponsored By Nvidia) 2-4PM Friday on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack & Tom Bock
The Roper Report   -
00:08:40 - PlayStation Shipped Cory Cudney a Disc Drive PS5, DualShockers
00:14:48 - COD using the DualSense, Eddie @ GameSpot
00:25:35 - Deathloop Release Date? Joe Skrebels @ IGN
00:30:32 - XBOX TWITTER TWEETS TOWER TODAY
00:35:00 - Xbox Disc Problems, Patricia Hernandez @ Polygon
00:39:20 -  Valhalla Doubles Odyssey’s Day 1 Player count, Gabe Gurwin @ GameSpot
00:42:10 - BREAKING NEWS: #GhostofTsusima is our fastest-selling first party original PS4 game with more than 5 million copies sold since its debut in July. What an incredible achievement by @SuckerPunchProd!
00:50:00 -  Ad  
00:53:15 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:55:32 - Do you think XBox has found its identity? - BJ Bernardo
TIM’S PSA’s
https://www.resetera.com/threads/lg-2017-2020-oleds-calibrated-settings-for-xbox-one-series-x-s-ps4-ps5-and-webos-sdr-hdr-dv.73304/
01:07:35 - Squad Up:(Google Stadia) TheMachos#9931
01:08:45 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Blessing
